text: @realDonaldTrump Yes. 76% of the electorate is demanding that you do something about the lack of fair treatment by the police of African Americans. And just like the COVID-19 pandemic, you are asleep at the wheel. Time to listen to the MAJORITY THAT IS NOT SILENT!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
